short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official 10trove extension to add troves to your 10trove clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now you can add links to your 10trove clipboard by using our new chrome extension. 
Collect,curate,discover and share links in sets of 10 using 10trove. 
Trove is a user curated collection of links which can be shared via your favorite social media platform. Use our extension to create troves and showcase them to the world.
